backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with storage and authorization mixins plus types for schools, staff, payments, packing, training, and related entities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains high-level summaries of multiple frontend files for build and feature mapping.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes React Query, router, theming, and app-level providers.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoDataUna: Demo-mode component that displays an alert when demo data is missing.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoPreview: Demo-mode banner with role switching and reset-warning logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout with role-based navigation, demo banner, and user menu including logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/RoleNav.t: Renders role‑based navigation links with active state handling and optional mobile behavior.
frontend/src/components/schools/SchoolSe: Displays a searchable school list with dynamic routing actions for different department views.
frontend/src/demo/demoDataStore.ts: Implements localStorage‑backed demo data persistence for schools and other domain records with reset handling.
frontend/src/demo/demoGuards.ts: Provides demo‑mode guards to restrict mutations and identify allowed demo actions.
frontend/src/demo/demoProfile.ts: Generates synthetic user profiles for each staff role in demo mode.
frontend/src/demo/demoRoutes.ts: Maps staff roles to their corresponding dashboard routes for demo mode.
frontend/src/demo/demoSession.ts: Manages demo‑mode session state in localStorage including credentials, role, and activation flags.
frontend/src/demo/useDemoPreview.ts: React hook exposing demo‑mode state with helpers to set role and exit demo mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication, identity persistence, and login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks and helpers for fetching and mutating user profiles, schools, payments, academic queries, and other demo or backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom button styling overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/academic/AcademicQuer: Displays academic queries with filtering and provides a dialog to respond to or update query status.
frontend/src/pages/accounts/SchoolPaymen: Shows school payment details and allows viewing and editing the outstanding amount for a specific school.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSchoolDeta: Displays detailed school information, update history, and related consolidated data with loading and demo handling states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Shows searchable and filterable system audit logs with demo mode restrictions and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OutstandingAmou: Allows admins to search schools and view/update each school's outstanding amount with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StaffManagement: Provides staff listing, creation, editing, and permission repair actions with modal dialogs and demo restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AcademicDa: Displays counts of open and resolved academic queries with navigation to the full queries list.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AccountsDa: Shows total school count and provides a school search panel for financial management.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Presents overall operational metrics including schools, outstanding amounts, packing status, and academic queries.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/MarketingD: Displays marketing metrics including total schools, outstanding amounts, and school-specific packing details with search and selection features.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PackingDas: Shows packing overview with total schools and provides quick navigation to search and manage packing operations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TrainingDa: Provides training metrics such as total schools and academic query counts, plus a school search panel for training workflows.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements the login UI supporting Internet Identity and demo mode, handling redirects based on user roles and authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/SchoolCreat: Form page for creating a new school, submitting details via mutation and redirecting based on staff role.
frontend/src/pages/packing/packingOption: Defines selectable packing class and theme options used in the packing workflow.
frontend/src/pages/packing/PackingSchool: Lists and filters schools for packing management, allowing users to select a school to view or update packing status.
frontend/src/pages/packing/SchoolPacking: Manages packing status and counts for a selected school with class and theme selection, status updates, and count editing.
frontend/src/pages/schools/SchoolDetails: Displays school details with editable fields for admins, loading state handling, and update mutation.
frontend/src/pages/training/SchoolTraini: Manages training visits for a school, including creating, editing, uploading proof, and submitting academic queries.
frontend/src/pages/training/TrainingQuer: Lists all academic queries raised by the user with loading skeletons and status badges.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router route tree, including authentication, dashboards, and demo-mode logic.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Provides safe extraction of user-friendly error messages, handling BigInt serialization issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings with custom plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project requirements for moving the Register School option to Admin, updating routing, and enforcing view‑only access for Marketing. Lists existing features, pending requests, and role-based authorization needs.
